1.speaker: SASAKO
1.character: どうしたの?パンダくん
1.definition: What's wrong, Panda? I don't wanna go to work. It's the rainy season now, so there aren't many visitors.

2.speaker: PANDA
2.character: ヒマでヒマで超退屈なんだ
2.definition: It's so boring and there's nothing to do. You're being dramatic.

3.character: どうせゴロゴロしてるだけでしょ
3.definition: But all you do is lay around anyway.

4.speaker: PANDA
4.character: ヒマすぎるってつらいんだよ
4.definition: It's hard to have nothing to do.

5.speaker: PANDA
5.character: それに僕は仕事でゴロゴロしてるの
5.definition: Not to mention I'm lying around for work.

6.speaker: PANDA
6.character: ただのゴロゴロとは違うんだから
6.definition: That's different from normal lying around.

7.speaker: PENGUIN
7.definition: I have no idea what you're talking about.

8.speaker: POLAR BEAR
8.character: 僕もヒマになってゴロゴロしてみたいね
8.definition: I want to try having nothing to do and lying around, too. There are times when I'm eating a snack slowly and only an hour's passed by.

9.speaker: PENGUIN
9.character: オヤツに１時間ってまるでセレブなマダムだね
9.definition: An hour for a snack? You're like one of those rich, old ladies.

10.speaker: HANDA
10.character: コラ!何してるんですか

11.speaker: PANDA
11.character: だってお客さんいなくて ヒマなんだもん
11.definition: There aren't any visitors, so we don't have anything to do.

12.speaker: HANDA
12.character: もう...ちゃぶ台なんか持ち込んで
12.definition: You even brought in a small table.

13.speaker: FT PANDA
13.character: いやぁ気づかれないように 持ち込むのが大変で大変で
13.definition: Yeah, it was so hard to bring it in without being noticed. You're not supposed to bring it in!

15.speaker: FT PANDA
15.character: 健康にいい熊笹茶でも一杯どう?
15.definition: How about a cup of healthybear bamboo grass tea?

17.speaker: FT PANDA
17.character: 熊笹茶に含まれる笹多糖体には
17.definition: The bamboo grass polysaccharides in this tea are said to have weight loss effects, too.

19.speaker: HANDA
19.character: いや最近メタボ気味でさ
19.definition: Well, I have been putting on a little weight lately.

20.speaker: HANDA
20.character: さっさと片付けなさ～い!
20.definition: Hurry and clean all of this up!

23.definition: It's only 10 o'clock. What? It's only been 30 minutes?

24.speaker: PANDA
24.character: 夢の中では アイドル歌手としてＣＤデビューして
24.definition: In my dream, I'd gotten my idol debut and released my first CD.

25.speaker: PANDA
25.character: 年末にはヤマアラシさんと年越しカウントダウンライブまでしたのに
25.definition: And at the end of the year, I was even in the New Year's count down live with Yama Arashi.

26.speaker: FT PANDA
26.character: よくそんな都合のいい夢が見られるもんだね
26.definition: It must be nice to be able to have such pleasing dreams.

27.speaker: FT PANDA
27.definition: So who is Yama Arashi? You don't know that nationally famous idol group?

29.speaker: FT PANDA
29.definition: That was depressing. Being told that something is common knowledge by Panda

30.character: 今なんかグサっときた

31.speaker: PANDA
31.character: 娘さんが２人もいるんでしょ?

33.speaker: FT PANDA
33.character: 最近あんまり会話がないしね
33.definition: We haven't been talking much, lately. This is getting really depressing,

34.character: 注：「嘿!看那边」 日本儿童游戏。猜拳的赢家手指一个方向，输家不能把头转向那个方向。若方向一致，则赢家胜，若不一致，则重新猜拳。
34.definition: so let's play "hey, look over there."

43.speaker: FT PANDA
43.character: もしかして私をバカにしてる?
43.definition: Are you mocking me by any chance?

44.speaker: PANDA
44.definition: I think I was sleeping wrong.

45.speaker: PANDA
45.character: 右にしか首が回らなくなっちゃったみたい
45.definition: I can only turn my head to the right.

47.speaker: FT PANDA
47.character: 注：宇宙机兵，80年代Studio Pierrot制作的机械动画《宇宙奇兵》的neta。
47.definition: A reprint edition model of theStar Gunner Bismar Ace.

48.definition: Oh... Don't say "Oh." You sound like my wife.

49.speaker: FT PANDA
49.character: これはね プレミアもので

50.speaker: FT PANDA
50.character: ネットオークションで落札するのが大変だったんだから
50.definition: and it was really hard to win it off the internet auction.

52.speaker: FT PANDA
52.definition: Could you stop it with the "Oh"?

53.speaker: PANDA
53.character: 常勤パンダさんが モデラーなんて知らなかったよ
53.definition: I didn't know you were into that kind of stuff, Mr. Full-time Panda.

54.speaker: FT PANDA
54.character: プラモは男のロマンだからね
54.definition: Plastic models are a man's passion.

55.speaker: FT PANDA
55.character: ねぇ私のコレクション見たい?
55.definition: Do you want to see my collection?

57.speaker: FT PANDA
57.character: 家にもたくさんあるんだけど
57.definition: I have a lot more at home,

58.speaker: FT PANDA
58.character: 狭くなるからって家族に迷惑がられててさ
58.definition: but my family complains that they're taking up too much room.

59.speaker: PANDA
59.character: 娘さんが２人もいるしね
59.definition: Well, you do have two daughters. Well... Oh, what?

60.speaker: FT PANDA
60.character: 奥さんのお腹に３人目が...
60.definition: My wife has a third in her tummy.

63.speaker: POLAR BEAR
63.character: はいしろくまカフェです
63.definition: Hello, this is Polar Bear's Café.

64.speaker: PANDA
64.definition: Hey, Polar Bear. I don't have anything to do, so let's play a word connecting game. I have things to do, though.

67.speaker: FT PANDA
67.character: はいふれあい動物園です
67.definition: Hello, this is the petting zoo.

69.speaker: FT PANDA
69.character: そう言われましてもね...

70.speaker: FT PANDA
70.character: パンダだって 休みたいときがありますよ

71.speaker: HANDA
71.character: すみません! すぐ行かせますので...
71.definition: I'm terribly sorry! I'll send them right over!

72.speaker: HANDA
72.character: ちゃんと仕事しなさい!

75.speaker: PANDA
75.character: 今日のお客さん第１号だからサービスしちゃおう
75.definition: They're our first visitors today, so I'll give them extra service!

76.speaker: BOTH
76.character: サービスサービス!サービスサービス!
76.definition: Service, service. Service, service. How cute!

77.speaker: GIRLS
77.character: パンダさんが けいれんしてる!

78.speaker: GIRL
78.character: 早く飼育員さんに知らせなきゃ!!
78.definition: Hurry! We have to get the zoo keeper!

79.speaker: PANDA
79.definition: This is depressing. How about we do the usual?

81.speaker: ALARM
81.character: 半田さん 急いでパンダコーナーに来てください
81.definition: Mr. Handa, please hurry and come to the Panda Corner.

83.speaker: HANDA
83.character: 今度は何やってるんですか?

84.speaker: FT PANDA
84.character: 半田さんマージャンできる?
84.definition: Do you know how to play mahjong, Mr. Handa?

86.speaker: PANDA
86.character: 大丈夫だよ 僕もルール知らないから
86.definition: Oh, you'll be fine. I don't know the rules either.

87.speaker: PANDA
87.character: 雨も降ってて お客さんも少ないし
87.definition: It's raining and there aren't that many visitors.

88.speaker: PANDA
88.character: 半田さんもどうせヒマでしょ?
88.definition: You don't have anything to do, right, Mr. Handa?

89.speaker: HANDA
89.character: さっさと片づけなさい!
89.definition: Hurry and clean all of this up!

90.speaker: SASAKO
90.character: ありがとうございました

91.speaker: PANDA
91.character: それでさヒマでヒマですごくつらかったんだ
91.definition: And then, it was really rough because we had nothing to do. I can't empathize with you at all.

92.speaker: PANDA
92.character: 今日なんか同じ漫画を３０回も読み返したんだよ
92.definition: I even read the same manga thirty times today.

93.speaker: PENGUIN
93.definition: Could I get another café mocha?

94.speaker: PANDA
94.character: シロクマくんいいヒマつぶしの方法ってないかな?
94.definition: Do you know any good ways to pass the time, Polar Bear?

97.speaker: PENGUIN
97.definition: That would be dried bonito {\i1}(katsuobushi){\i0}. Oh, the moon...

98.speaker: PENGUIN
98.definition: That would be the folk song "Tanko Bushi."

99.speaker: PANDA
99.character: シロクマくんって ヒマつぶしに困らなそうだよね
99.definition: Polar Bear doesn't seem to have problems passing the time.

101.speaker: SASAKO
101.character: 私は目的を決めずに自転車で遠出するとかかな
101.definition: I like to go on bike rides with no set destination.

102.speaker: SASAKO
102.character: あとは地図を眺めて風景を想像しながらの街歩き
102.definition: I also like to wander around the citywith a map, admiring the sights.

104.speaker: MANDRILL
104.character: プチプチをひたすら潰します
104.definition: I pop bubble wrap all the time.

105.speaker: TORTOISE
105.definition: I read... really long... historical novels.

106.speaker: LLAMA
106.character: 黒ベタのジグソーパズルが難しすぎて時間を忘れられますよ
106.definition: Solid black jigsaw puzzles are hard and can help you forget time.

107.speaker: KOALA
107.character: みんなうらやましいな

108.speaker: KOALA
108.character: 僕なんか１日２０時間は休まないとダメだから
108.definition: I have to rest for twenty hours a day,

109.speaker: KOALA
109.character: 起きてる時間が足りなくて 困って困って...
109.definition: so I never have enough time when I'm awake.

110.speaker: PENGUIN
110.character: 僕だって予定表がいっぱいで足りないよ。
110.definition: My schedule is really full, too.

112.speaker: PENGUIN
112.character: ペン子さんって すごい働き者でね
112.definition: Miss Penko is a really hard worker, and it's really hard to visit her everyday. So I don't have any time at all. And—

113.speaker: PANDA
113.character: シロクマくん笹をちょうだい
113.definition: Could I get some bamboo grass, Polar Bear?

115.speaker: PENGUIN
115.character: それでさ ペン子さんがサービス券をね...
115.definition: And then Miss Penko gave me service tickets...

116.speaker: PANDA
116.character: その話はもう何度も聞いたよ
116.definition: We already heard that story too many times.

117.speaker: POLAR BEAR
117.character: まもなく当店は閉店いたします
117.definition: Our store will be closing shortly.

119.speaker: POLAR BEAR
119.definition: I wanted to try this at least once.

120.speaker: PANDA
120.definition: It's already closing time... Time flies by so fast at Polar Bear's Café.

122.speaker: ALARM
122.character: 半田さん 至急パンダコーナーに来てください
122.definition: Mr. Handa, please come to the Panda Corner immediately.

123.speaker: HANDA
123.definition: What in the world is this?!

124.speaker: PANDA
124.definition: Could I get my usual, Mr. Handa?

125.speaker: FT PANDA
125.character: 半田さんモーニングセット
125.definition: Could I get the breakfast set, Mr. Handa?

126.speaker: LLAMA
126.character: チョコパフェください
126.definition: Could I get a chocolate parfait?

128.speaker: KOALA
128.definition: Could I get a cocoa, Mr. Handa?

129.speaker: HANDA
129.character: さっさと片づけなさい!
129.definition: Hurry and clean all of this up!

130.speaker: HANDA
130.character: ここはカフェじゃありませ～ん!
